tool_description: Parses Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) documents to extract structured speech instructions including prosody, pronunciation, and voice control directives.

validation_level.description: SSML validation level: strict, moderate, or permissive

error_messages: Invalid SSML syntax: SSML content contains syntax errors.
Unsupported SSML elements: Some SSML elements are not supported by the parser.
Validation failed: SSML content does not meet validation requirements.
Empty SSML content: Provide valid SSML markup for parsing.
usage: Provide ssml_content with valid SSML markup. Optionally set validation_level to control parsing strictness. Returns structured speech instructions for synthesis.

parsed_text.description: Plain text extracted from SSML markup

voice_changes.description: Voice parameter changes specified in SSML
